A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found myself almost screaming from how good some moments in the last jedi were. That's a thing that this movie does well\, setting up really interesting and emotional moments that genuinely left me in awe. I absolutely loved my time with the last jedi\, I agree\, it's not a perfect movie. The writing sometimes is off\, you will notice it\, there is a part in the movie that is flat out boring compared to everything else that's happening \, but it's nothing major that will ruin this wonderful roller-coaster of a movie. Absolutely recommend!
